description: on the right half of the image is a man in a coat holding a hat in one hand and raising the other to chest level; on the left half of the image is a staircase leading to a closed door; the figure is colored with a stripe of pink and the door and parts of the background are in light green
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Eigendruck | BC margin of sheet, in pencil: E.148-II | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1909
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 22/23
title: Man in Front of the Door
